Keywords: Injustice League , Mystical , Secret Society of Super-Villains
Real Name: Felix Faust
Special Powers
A DEAL WORTHY OF MY NAMESAKE: When an opposing character within range would use Outwit, Probability Control, or Perplex, roll a d6. 1: That character can use that power an additional time this turn. 4-5: The use of that power has no effect. 6: The use of that power has no effect and, after resolutions, deal that character 1 penetrating damage.
TRAVELING THE LEY LINES: Stealth // FREE: Place Felix Faust in a square up to 4 squares away from his current square.
THE BELL, THE WHEEL, THE JAR OF THE DEMONS THREE: Outwit, Probability Control, Enhancement.

Comments
June 5, 2022
nelson2208
Played against him last night. I underestimated his Traveling Ley Lines power as that free movement made him uber flexible and always in position to mess with my plans. Plus my friend faustily enjoyed rolling the die every time I used a support power and he hit 4-5or6 four straight times! Mystic, super senses, and PC are great defense and I never touched Felix. Great piece.
April 22, 2021
Goop
You got a 50/50 shot to shut of an opposing players outwit prob or perplex and you dont even need LOF, just range. Not to mention he gives outwit and prob himself with good attack values with good mobility in stealth. This is a great piece all around... just dont roll a 1 too often.
